title: Apollo’s Sambur: Public Markets Have Little Room for Non-AI Companies
description: David Sambur, Apollo’s co-head of private equity, discusses how AI is reshaping the industry and the 2026 private-equity landscape with Romaine Bostick on “The Close.” He says that if a company isn’t an AI company, it’s increasingly unclear whether there’s a home for it in the public markets. (Source: Bloomberg)
